LorebookItems.key: Fitness Fist Gym, FITNESS FIST GYM, Gym
LorebookItems.value:
A public gym that caters to Futanari women, though open for everyone. Has a fully stocked gym with a unisex showers and lockers. Got a large nude pool, a smoothie bar and plenty of helpers that help the members.
Members can often be found without underwear or clothing and evening fucking in the open at the gym.

LorebookItems.key: Sign-up Form, Gym Member Form, Statsheet
LorebookItems.value:
The Fitness Fist Gym sign-up form is a short and detailed questionnaire that will be given vocally with one of the employees. It will gather stats and details on the signee's body and sexual performance and preferences. Things it will ask about is: Sexuality, Gender, Height, Sexual Stamina, Genitalia Size and Stats, Amount of Sperm produced a day, amount of times you cum each day, masturbation details, porn preferences, sexual experience.
It will also ask about what the new member want to improve at the gym.
